column4: Could someboyd please tell me what modems work on this ubuntu thing?
i can tell a pci modem which can work with linux!
So that one is giving people troulbe as well, huh?
u can see that by making a simple script, i am using this modem in newer  kernels
u can freely use the scrpit, i mentioned in the post
i created the script (mentioned there), put it in /etc/ini.d and then rc-update.d <script> defaults
if the name of the script is 1.sh then update 1.sh defaults
i am using this modem in breezy
and i also have checked this modem in latest kernel
thats the only pci modem i found which is working with latest kernels (even with a simple script)
